meanings.sent1: The dog ambulates around the park every morning.
meanings.sent2: She ambulates to school every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat ambulates in circles around the yard, chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The river ambulates through the valley, carving its path over time.
meanings.sent5: The elderly man ambulates slowly with the help of his cane.

meanings.sent1: The toddler ambulates around the house, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent2: He ambulates through the forest, enjoying the fresh air.
meanings.sent3: The penguin ambulates awkwardly on land, waddling to the water.
meanings.sent4: The dancer ambulates gracefully across the stage, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The explorer ambulates through the jungle, discovering new species along the way.
